(1) An heir shall be responsible for the decedent's debts up to the amount of the value of the inherited property.
(2) An heir who has renounced his or her inheritance shall not be responsible for the decedent's debts.
(3) If there is more than one heir, they are jointly and severally liable for the decedent's debts, each up to the value of his or her hereditary portion, irrespective of whether the division has been executed or not.
(4) The debts shall be divided among the heirs in proportion to their hereditary portions, unless otherwise determined by the will.
